Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

buff
class buff {
             int Type;
             int Size;
             int Pos;
             string Filename;
             mixed Value;
}
server
class server {
               int Descriptor;
               int Blocking;
               int Closing;
               class buff * Buffer;
}
